---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
install.packages('read_excel')
install.packages('gk')
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library('readxl')
library(gk)
```
Read in the Excel Data
```{r}
my_dir<-file.path('~','time series','data' )
my_file<-file.path(my_dir,'Data to Test g&h.xlsx')
d<-read_excel(my_file)
```

```{r}
d %>% 
  ggplot() + aes(x=Data) + scale_x_log10() + geom_density()
```
Simulate some observations
```{r}
r<-rgk(5000,A=3,B=1,g=2,k=0.5)
ggplot() + aes(x=r) + scale_x_log10() + geom_density()
```
